primary_analysis.reasoning: Last 20-30 candles show a clear bullish run with strong green candles and rising volume. Price has broken above the recent consolidation/resistance around 1.1610 and is pushing toward 1.1630 — a tight 20-pip actionable breakout zone. Momentum looks strong; consider buying on continuation or pullback to the 1.1610–1.1630 zone with stop below the zone.

entry_analysis.reasoning: Recent bullish breakout and follow-through candles located inside the 15-min zone (1.161–1.163). Zone narrowed to the 20-pip core overlap (1.16100–1.16300). Pattern formed in the last several candles, so an immediate scalp entry is reasonable.
